features.name: features
features.title: Unlock Unlimited Possibilities with AI
features.text: Our platform offers a wide range of features designed to enhance your image creation experience. From easy-to-use editing tools to powerful AI-powered image generation, we have everything you need to bring your ideas to life.

hero.title2: Transform your photos with the power of AI
hero.title3: From headshots to influencer photos, AI's state-of-the-art technology ensures you always look your best. Create, edit, and generate images effortlessly.

price.title2: Choose an offordable plan that is packed with the best features for engaging your audience,createing customer loyalty and driving sales. engaging your

footer.title1: Image AI Inc. All rights reserved.

dashboard.HeroSubheading: Perfect Logos for Apps, Businesses, and Websites
dashboard.HeroDesc: Craft unique and professional logos effortlessly with our AI-powered tool. Perfect for apps, businesses, websites, and more!
dashboard.LogoTitleDesc: Add Your Business, App, or Website Name for a Custom Logo
dashboard.LogoDescDesc: Share your ideas, themes, or inspirations to create a logo that perfectly represents your brand or project.
dashboard.LogoIdeaDesc: Choose a design style that aligns with your vision, or skip to receive a random suggestion.
dashboard.LogoDesignDesc: Select the type of logo design that best represents your brand's unique identity.
dashboard.LogoColorPaletteDesc: Pick the colors that reflect your brand's personality and create a lasting impression.
dashboard.LogoPricingModelDesc: Generate Unlimited Fast Logos with your favorite model
dashboard.LoadingWaitDesc: ✨ Please wait a moment while we work our magic to bring your logo to life.
